modName: No more glow with armor spells
summary: A very small mod. Removes the glow you get with an armor spell form the alteration school (oakflesh, stoneflesh, ebonyflesh, dragonhide). Get the protection, stop the annoying green s**t all over you.
descriptionHtml:
A very small mod. Removes the glow you get with an armor spell of the alteration school (oakflesh, stoneflesh, ebonyflesh, dragonhide). Get the protection, stop the annoying blue-green s**t all over you.

What more can I say ?
Duns_inc\\\'s Shaders Begon http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6566 removes nearly all glow effects. I still wanted ton enjoy a bit of glow for magic equipment, but the armor spells looked too ugly on my khajit warrior\\\'s tail.

If you don\'t want to just remove the aura and if you\'re looking for a replacer, check 	
Alternate Effect Colors for Alteration Armor by DaltonTheHobo  
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22895
author: popopipo
